price: I Allaha moli za oprost; Allah je, uistinu, Onaj Koji oprašta grijehe i milostiv je.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-is'taghfiri al-laha inna al-laha kāna ghafūran raḥīman
